overview:
Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, Sparkfly is a leading provider of promotion redemption and tracking technology. Sparkfly’s patented promotion redemption platform tracks consumer purchases in real-time at the point-of-sale, helping merchants acquire new customers and increase repeat visits through personalized promotions that influence purchase behavior. Sparkflyâ€™s platform is the missing ingredient that enables merchants and brands to capitalize on mobile, social and local marketing.

These deals, repeat deals, and other fun stuff are redeemed through a free mobile web app that can be accessed through today’s most popular mobile devices.

â€¢ Private Label solutions that are used by retailers, CPG companies, food service restaurants, and other companies to implement targeted shopper-marketing programs. These programs are designed to influence consumer behavior and drive store traffic by offering personalized promotions and offers to consumers that are redeemed at the point-of-sale.
